<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5031</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Auditory Discrimination</string>
            <string language="es">Discriminación auditiva</string>
            <string language="ga">Idirdhealú Éistitheach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehörunterscheidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discrimination Auditive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discriminação Auditory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distinzione Uditiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουστική διάκριση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Auditory discriminatin difficulties may play a significant part in the poor language skills often assossiated with the special needs pupil and the teacher will need to pay particular attention to this area of development.  Lessons here attempt to integrate listening skills into the general development of language in the young child.</string>
            <string language="es">Las dificultades de discriminación auditiva pueden jugar una parte importante en unas habilidades lingüísticas pobres, a menudo asociadas con los alumnos con necesidades especiales, el profesor tendrá que prestar atención especial a esta área de desarroll</string>
            <string language="ga">Seans go mbeidh páirt suntasach ag idirdhealú éistitheach i ndrochscileanna teanga leis an dalta le riachtanais spesialta agus neidh ar an múinteoir aird ar leith a thabhairt don réimse forbartha seo. Déanann ceachtanna anseo iarracht scileanna éisteachta</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehördiscriminatin Schwierigkeiten können eine 
bedeutende Rolle in den schlechten Sprachenfähigkeiten spielen 
assossiated häufig mit der speziellen Notwendigkeiten Pupille und der
Lehrer muß diesen Bereich der Entwicklung insbesondere beachten. 
Lektionen hier versuchen, hörende Fähigkeiten in die 
allgemeine Entwicklung der Sprache im jungen Kind zu integrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les difficultés auditives de discriminatin 
peuvent jouer un rôle significatif dans les capacités linguistiques 
faibles assossiated souvent avec la pupille spéciale des besoins et 
le professeur devra prêter une attention particulière à ce domaine 
du développement. Les leçons ici essayent d'intégrer des 
qualifications d'écoute dans le développement général du langage 
dans l'enfant en bas âge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As dificuldades auditory do discriminatin podem 
fazer uma parte significativa nas habilidades de língua deficientes 
assossiated frequentemente com a pupila especial das necessidades e o 
professor necessitará pagar a atenção particular a esta área de 
desenvolvimento. As lições aqui tentam integrar habilidades 
escutando no desenvolvimento geral da língua na criança nova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le difficoltà uditive di discriminatin possono 
fare una parte significativa nelle povere abilità di linguaggio 
spesso assossiated con la pupilla speciale di bisogni e l'insegnante 
dovrà prestare particolare attenzione a questa zona di sviluppo. 
Le lezioni qui tentano di integrare le abilità ascoltanti nello
sviluppo generale del linguaggio nel bambino in giovane età.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ακουστικές δυσκολίες discriminatin μπορούν να 
παίξουν έναν σημαντικό ρόλο στις φτωχές γλωσσικές δεξιότητες 
συχνά με τον ειδικό μαθητή αναγκών και ο δάσκαλος θα πρέπει να 
δώσει ιδιαίτερη προσοχή σε αυτόν τον τομέα της ανάπτυξης. 
Τα μαθήματα προσπαθούν εδώ να ενσωματώσουν τις δεξιότητες 
ακούσματος στη γενική ανάπτυξη της γλώσσας στο μικρό παιδί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
